issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

see ticket and attached test case with ticket. click set button multiple times crashes app (this button creates a row object with a label and calls setData).

http://helpdesk.appcelerator.net/tickets/1196

{html}
fields.summary: crash on multiple setData on table view

comments.body:
{html}

(from [4e3aef1c09df458d58a523eadb594d93ed0852ac]) - fixed crasher in table view -- make sure view proxy is explicitly set to nil on destroy of proxy in case view is still around (TableView specifically). closes #443 http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/4e3aef1c09df4...

{html}
